timeline.bodyText:
It's cheaper to write -1 with SignedNumeric when the segment is missing.
It's also cheaper when reading, because autoboxing won't have to look up the segment in the Integer cache.

Could we change parseStoreAttribute to parse the base store attributes and let the specific store methods parse the store-specific attributes?
